name: Aurlean Colors
description: The Aim of the game is not to get hit by the opposite color Like if you are Blue and you get hit by Red, you take damage, but if you get hit by your color then your power bars go up and if you get them to a certain amount it gives you an extra boost] You are the pilot of the Aureleon 1 a mysterious spaceship created by the government to counter the oncoming alien invasion, your goal is to defeat the aliens before they get to earth, this invasion is kept underwraps from the entire earth. So the Earth is depending on you!
